SPEAKING: TONE The tone of a word or sentence in English is usually determined by the speaker. One thing, however, which affects your pronunciation is the amount of air you let out with the consonant(s) you pronounce. If you make the consonant(s) you pronounce say the same sound over too long, you make a sound so long that many people will not be able to recognize it. If you use the consonant(s) you pronounce too long, one of the problems that you will have is saying the vowels or words before them more quickly than the consonants. You can help to solve this problem by giving the consonant(s) you pronounce some energy. The best way to do this is to pronounce the consonants slowly, but loudly. What Is Marly Spanish Both?
Marly Spanish Both is a Spanish-language software application that lets you speak and understand Spanish in everyday life, whether you're in Spain or the United States. You can control the program through your computer and have your sentences translated into Spanish as you say them.
It's a great tool for travelers who want to learn Spanish and have it understood by locals in both countries.
How to Get Marly Spanish Both?
To get Marly Spanish Both, first go to marlyspanishboth.com and fill out the form with your name, address, and email address.
Once you have registered, you will need to pay a fee of $39.95 per month. You can also pay for an annual subscription which is slightly cheaper at $447.54 per year.
After signing up, you will receive an email with instructions on how to download the software and start using it.
How to Use Marly Spanish Both?
After downloading and installing Marly Spanish Both, open it and click on "Get Started."
On the left side of the program, select the language you want to use- either Spanish or English.
Click on the voice recording icon in the top left corner and speak clearly into your microphone so that your words are accurately recorded and translated.
If you are using an American pronunciation guide, you can also click on the "Voice" icon in the top right corner and select "American Pronunciation Guide" from the list.
Click on the "Translate" icon in the center of the program and your text will be translated into Spanish automatically.
Marly Spanish is a popular and reliable Spanish-language software application. It helps you speak and understand Spanish in everyday life, whether you're in Spain or the United States. You can control the program through your computer and have your sentences translated into Spanish as you say them. For just $39.95 per month, Marly Spanish is a great tool for travelers who want to learn Spanish and have it understood by locals in both countries.

Hello, I'm Dr. Vicki Flinn, and today's topic is "Sleep Well to Live Well." The first important tip for healthy heart living is get a good night's sleep. Now, that may be easier for you than it is for someone else, but we all really need that good night's sleep. It's important. Sleep keeps your brain alert during the day, and it helps prevent heart disease, heart attack and stroke. But, if you're not sleeping well, you may have a higher risk for these dangerous diseases. What's more, sleep disorders can be caused by other health problems, such as depression, anxiety or sleep apnea. With your doctor's help, you can begin to fall asleep easier. You can try sleeping in a cool, quiet, dark room or room that's kept comfortable. Your doctor may recommend trying a softer pillow or a firm one. You might need to take a vitamin B6 supplement. Or, you may find sleeping pills helpful. Remember, a good night's sleep is essential to your health. But, don't ever take sleeping pills if you drink alcohol or have liver disease, or take antidepressant medicines, since they can increase your risk for a bad fall. A sleeping disorder called sleep apnea can be particularly important in heart attacks. But people with breathing problems at night often don't recognize it. Sleep apnea often goes untreated, and can be treated with a continuous positive airway pressure, or CPAP, machine. With a CPAP machine, the patient is given a face mask and attached to an air pump with tubing that's hooked up to the air pump. It's a safe, quiet way to prevent sleep apnea. Another thing you can try is going to a sleep disorder center. There, patients spend the night hooked up to sensors that track breathing and other functions during sleep. A doctor may suggest different treatment options after reviewing the results. And finally, don't overlook simple solutions to a good night's sleep. Try relaxation techniques like yoga or meditation. And, if you need special equipment like a TV, fan or humidifier to help you sleep better, discuss that with your health care provider. rMarSecurity Spanish BothPIE1000 English, English [Auto], English [Auto] [Auto] 36 Mbps Download 203.129.210.55:2002

Hello, I'm Dr. Vicki Flinn, and today's topic is "Protect Your Lungs and Heart." The first important tip for healthy heart living is protect your lungs and heart. Good heart health starts as a child and the lung health we had at birth has a large impact on cardiovascular disease as an adult. Children with poor lung health have more health risk factors for adult heart disease. Exposure to irritants such as tobacco smoke, as well as chronic lung infections, can lead to lung disease.
